question.questionText: Under what circumstances will a damaged/ burned out bulb affect another bulb?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: If they are in the same path the burned out bulb affects the other bulb.
It depends on whether or not they are in the same path
The damaged bulb and the other bulb must be contained in the same path

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: the path is not on the same as the battery
if it is in the same closed path with the battery
if they are on the same path
when there is a gap in the circuit
IF IT CREATES A GAP IN THE PATH
